hero.badge: 20+ years in IT · Available for engagements
hero.titleLine2: 20 years in the making — now working for you.
hero.description: Independent software engineer and QA consultant with experience in banking, cybersecurity, and digital transformation. From one-time projects to long-term engagements.

about.description1: DevLogic was born from a simple idea: experience gained from leading enterprise projects should be accessible to everyone. With over 20 years in IT, I've walked the full path — from software development, through leading teams of up to 15 engineers, to managing QA departments at global companies in cybersecurity and financial services.
about.description2: My particular strength lies in project management and digital transformation — I've coordinated international digital banking projects, led core banking system implementations across multiple markets, and built QA processes from the ground up in corporate environments.
about.description3: Today, I apply all of that to projects for companies of all sizes — with the same structure and rigor, but without corporate bureaucracy and agency overhead.
about.card1Desc: Experience in software engineering, QA, and project management
about.card2Desc: Largest team I've managed in an enterprise environment
about.card3Desc: Domains where I've built and tested enterprise systems
about.card4Desc: You work directly with me — no middlemen

items.title: Startups & Small Teams
items.description: Need a reliable technical partner to bring your MVP or web application to production? I work as an extension of your team — flexible and without long contracts.

items.title: Growing Companies
items.description: Is your team growing faster than your QA processes? I help establish testing, automation, and DevOps practices that scale with you.

items.title: Enterprise & Corporations
items.description: Need an independent QA consultant or project coordinator with experience on complex international implementations? I bring an enterprise mindset without agency overhead.

services.description: Focused services built on real enterprise experience.

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Building web applications from scratch or upgrading existing systems. Modern stack, clean code, responsive design. Includes infrastructure setup and deployment.

items.title: Testing & QA
items.description: Automated testing and quality assurance — my primary expertise with experience leading QA teams in enterprise environments.

items.title: QA Consulting
items.description: Need to establish a QA process, improve an existing one, or assess your testing maturity? I bring experience gained from leading QA departments in banking and cybersecurity.
features: QA maturity assessment and gap analysis
Introducing QA best practices and processes

items.title: IT Consulting & Project Management
items.description: Digital transformation, international IT project coordination, and strategic advisory — with experience leading complex implementations in banking and fintech.

products.description: A clear, straightforward process from first call to delivery.

items.title: Discovery
items.description: Free 30-minute introductory call. We understand your problem, define the project scope, and set timelines. No commitment.

items.title: Proposal
items.description: Within 2-3 business days I send a detailed proposal — fixed price for defined projects, or hourly rate for ongoing engagements. For enterprise clients: I work with your procurement process and NDAs.

items.title: Execution
items.description: Iterative development with regular updates. Access to Git repository and staging environment. Direct communication — email, Slack, or whatever works for you.

items.title: Delivery & Support
items.description: Production deployment, technical documentation, and 30 days of free support. For consulting engagements — a final report with recommendations and action plan.

whyUs.description: We're not just another development agency. We're your strategic technology partner committed to your long-term success.

reasons.title: Proven Track Record
reasons.description: 150+ successful projects delivered with 99% client satisfaction rate.

reasons.title: Expert Team
reasons.description: Senior engineers and designers with deep expertise across technologies.

reasons.title: On-Time Delivery
reasons.description: We respect deadlines and deliver quality work within agreed timelines.

reasons.title: Clear Communication
reasons.description: Regular updates, transparent processes, and always accessible team.

reasons.title: Security First
reasons.description: Enterprise-grade security practices built into every solution we deliver.

reasons.title: Scalable Solutions
reasons.description: Architecture designed for growth, from startup to enterprise scale.

portfolio.description: A selection of projects that showcase our expertise and commitment to excellence.
portfolio.cta: Want to see more? Let's talk about your project

testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our partners have to say.

items.quote: DevLogic transformed our vision into reality. Their technical expertise and attention to detail exceeded our expectations.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: The team's commitment to quality and communication made the entire development process smooth and predictable.
